# DexTRAC

<!-- badges: start -->

usethis::use_lifecycle_badge('experimental')

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of DexTRAC is to calculate antigen-TCR specificities through noisy Dextramer counts.

## Installation

You can install the development version of DexTRAC from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lijxug/DexTRAC")
```

Please check Tutorail.Rmd for examples
